    public class ProcessorIntrospectionOutboundPort
extends fr.upmc.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements ProcessorIntrospectionI
    The class ProcessorIntrospectionOutboundPort defines an outbound port associated with the interface ProcessorIntrospectionI.
